CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 5 reads: "Loendi Salute to Eckstine Huge Success at Famous Door - Big Night For Mr. B - When Billy Eckstine came home during Christmas Week for an engagement at the Stanley Theatre, the Loendi Club sponsored a highly successful homecoming week for the famous crooning Pittsburgher. The week of affairs was climaxed by a huge celebration at the Famous Door on Dec. 30.  Man, notables were on hand and Mr. B. received numerous gifts  in token of esteem..."
TitMainTitle: Daisy Lampkin presenting items to Billy Eckstine at microphone in Famous Door club with posters advertising The Great Mr. B and MGM records
CatSubject_tab: Eckstine, Billy.Lampkin, Daisy E. (Daisy Elizabeth), 1882-1965.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Famous Door (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Clubs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
